item.title: Gaganchumbi Mahal
item.description: Gaganchumbi Mahal is an OSINT-related CTF challenge hosted by Team NCA@Nepal. NCA@Nepal is Nepal’s active cybersecurity community and Capture The Flag (CTF) team, where learning and sharing knowledge are at the heart of everything they do. Their motto is ‘Learn and Share: Growing Together in Cybersecurity’. In the challenge, a short description and image were provided. You can see them in the image below: Whenever we are solving the challenge, we need to carefully read the description and set a clear goal for what we need to find out.
